resources.string: A.1 Chirag Bargoojar and Dhruv Maindola build this app using Kotlin+Java and it takes us 2-3 weeks to build this app from scratch.
A.2 The purpose of this app to put our learned knowledge towards an app which helps both of us to achieve our goal to become android app developers.
A.4 Dhruv Maindola build all the XML/UI layout and design the app cause he is very creative while Chirag Bargoojar build the backend working of app and work on creating good user experience
A.3 We get the idea while we are ordering digital books from amazon and kindle. We both came to know that its really easy to build apps like this so we started building.
A.5 There are 4 activities, 2 adapter classes, 13-14 XML layouts(UI), 3 database files and an interface for database, 4 fragments and some other files for validation check and internet connection.

A.6 We add in-build feature in android for connecting to internet that is ConnectionManager class which is used to connect and check if internet is working. And about data, data is coming from an open source API(Application programming interface) which have the name of books and al the info of particular book.
